subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: In crucial matchups, Rory McIlroy and Sergio García of Europe will face the Americans Phil Mickelson and Keegan Bradley, and Stephen Gallacher and Ian Poulter will face Jordan Spieth and Patrick Reed.
snippet: In crucial matchups, Rory McIlroy and Sergio García of Europe will face the Americans Phil Mickelson and Keegan Bradley, and Stephen Gallacher and Ian Poulter will face Jordan Spieth and Patrick Reed.
